EmailTemplate.name: Sacramento Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: vAuto Sales Process Workshop Tomorrow - Sacramento, CA - March 18, 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
vAuto Sales Process Workshop Sacramento, CA Wednesday, March 18, 2015
This is a reminder that you are registered for the vAuto Sales Process Workshop in Sacramento, CA on Wednesday, March 18. If you have any questions or concerns, simply reply to this email.
Location: Courtyard Sacramento Midtown 4422 Y Street Sacramento, CA 95817 916-455-6800
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Courtyard Sacramento Midtown, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/maps/travel/saccy-courtyard-sacramento-midtown/> or call the hotel directly at 916-455-6800. We look forward to seeing you there!
